title: DEV QUIZ
description: A Next.js quiz game where players select topics and answer OpenAI-generated questions, tracking stats with PostgreSQL and Prisma.

title: OTZAR.AI
description: A responsive landing page built with React and Express that processes whitelist requests, offering a seamless user experience.

title: YULETIDE TOKEN
description: A responsive React landing page using styled-components to showcase token features with modern design and smooth animations.

title: RUNBRO
description: A fitness app encouraging daily running with rewards for achieving goals, with the frontend developed in Next.js.

title: GOLANG BLOCKCHAIN
description: A fully functional blockchain built with Go, featuring a wallet UI and handling server interactions.

title: WEAVESWAP
description: A decentralized exchange and lending protocol built for the BNB Hackathon, with smart contracts designed and deployed for the platform.

title: TOKEN BRIDGE
description: A decentralized token bridge for secure cross-chain transfers, built with Solidity and Hardhat using secure signing methods.

title: E-COMMERCE BACKEND
description: A robust Express.js backend for an e-commerce platform that manages accounts, authentication, orders, and shopping carts.

title: LIQUIDITY POOL
description: A full-featured liquidity pool built with Solidity, JavaScript, and Hardhat that supports token swaps, liquidity, and yield farming.

title: ERC-1155 GAME ITEMS
description: A smart contract for creating game items like avatars and power-ups using ERC-1155, with Chainlink VRF for random outcomes.

title: CHARITY DAO
description: A decentralized charity funding DAO built with OpenZeppelin contracts, streamlining funding with transparency and low intermediary costs.

title: WALLET SIGNATURE
description: An implementation of the EIP712 standard for secure wallet signatures, developed using the Foundry framework.

title: TRADING BOT
description: A Python trading bot using the Double Supertrend strategy with Heikin Ashi candles, trading on Binance via API integrations.
